title.en: A Prayer to Drodül Pawo Dorje, Vidyādhara of Unparalleled Kindness

text.en: Oṃ svasti.
text.en-trans: om swasti

text.en: The Vajradhara of Oḍḍiyāna, embodiment of the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tsa sum kündü orgyen dorjé chang

text.en: In his manifestation of the one primordial wisdom,
text.en-trans: gang gi yeshe chik gi namrol lé

text.en: Had twenty-five disciples, of whom you were the foremost,
text.en-trans: bang rik nyerngé khyuchok ma tok jé

text.en: Lord Matok with the name of Rinchen—to you I pray.1
text.en-trans: rinchen tsen chang zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Then, to illuminate this dark age of fivefold degeneration,
text.en-trans: denyi nga dö makrum salwé lé

text.en: Like the light of the moon, you appeared in your compassion,
text.en-trans: dawé ö tar salwé tukjé chen

text.en: With inconceivable qualities of knowledge, love and power,
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nüpé yönten sam mikhyab

text.en: Drodül Pawo Dorje, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: drodul pawo dorjér solwa deb

text.en: You received the essence of the wisdom minds of hosts of gurus
text.en-trans: gong da nyengyü lamé tsok nam kyi

text.en: From mind-direct, symbolic and whispered transmissions and mastered the treasury of Samantabhadra’s realization,
text.en-trans: tuk kyi chü tob kunzang gong dzö wang

text.en: To became the crown-ornament of all accomplished vidyādharas—
text.en-trans: rigdzin drubpa yong kyi tsuk gi gyen

text.en: Natsok Rangdrol, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: natsok rangdrol zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Merely to glimpse the maṇḍala of your form brings liberation,
text.en-trans: ku yi kyilkhor tongwa tsam gyi drol

text.en: Your voice resounds like the thunderous roar of a dragon,
text.en-trans: sung gi dang ké druk gi dra tar dir

text.en: And your wisdom realization is as deep as the ocean—
text.en-trans: tuk kyi gongpa gyatso tar zabpa

text.en: Glorious guru, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: palden lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In teaching, your elegant association of words and meanings is a delight to hear,
text.en-trans: ché na tsikdön drel lek nawar nyen

text.en: Through debate, you crush opponents like a mountain that grinds them to dust,
text.en-trans: tsöpé pé gol drakri chemar tak

text.en: And your compositions are like a sacred monument of essential teachings—
text.en-trans: tsompa nyingpö tenpé chö dong ché

text.en: Great bodhisattva, heir of the victorious ones, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gyalsé sempa chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Never wavering from the constant experience of clear light,
text.en-trans: taktu ösal ngang lé mi yo zhing

text.en: All deluded thoughts and habitual patterns have faded into absolute space,
text.en-trans: trul tok bakchak tamché ying su nub

text.en: And with great non-referential compassion you come to beings' aid—
text.en-trans: mikmé nyingjé chenpo dro la juk

text.en: Primordial lord and guru, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lama dömé gönpor solwa deb

text.en: From this moment on, until I reach the essence of awakening,
text.en-trans: deng né zung té changchub nyingpö bar

text.en: Care for me, vidyādhara guru, without ever parting,
text.en-trans: rigdzin lamé dralmé jesu zung

text.en: So that I may receive the blessings of the wisdom-mind transmission—
text.en-trans: tuk gyü gongpé jin lab tobpa dang

text.en: To you who accomplish your own and others' welfare, I pray.
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi drubpar solwa deb

text.en: May the teachings, the source of benefit and happiness, spread far and wide.
text.en-trans: pendé jungné tenpa dar zhing gyé

text.en: May the lives of the sublime holders of the teachings remain secure.
text.en-trans: tendzin kyechok zhabpé tenpa dang

text.en: May the saṅgha increase and the whole world practise the ten virtues.
text.en-trans: gendün pel zhing jikten gé chur chö

text.en: May the decline of the environment and beings be halted, and may virtue and goodness abound.
text.en-trans: nöchü gü zhi gelek pelgyé shok
